de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.callback_interfaces

Interface ClientListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPsychicServer, ClientConnectionManager, GraphingServer, KukaServer, MouseServer, NesServer, PsychicServer

    public interface ClientListener
    Implement to be notified of client events:

    • acceptClient(NetworkDevice) for checking whether you want to accept a new client
    • onClientAccepted(NetworkDevice) called when a client has successfully connected
    • onClientDisconnected(NetworkDevice) when a client leaves, or lost connection
    • onClientTimeout(NetworkDevice) when a client no longer responds

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptClient(NetworkDevice newClient)
      Check whether a new client should be accepted
      void onClientAccepted(NetworkDevice connectedClient)
      Called when a Client has successfully been connected
      void onClientDisconnected(NetworkDevice disconnectedClient)
      Called when a client sent a disconnect signal or has disconnected
      void onClientTimeout(NetworkDevice timeoutClient)
      Called when a client hasn't responded in a while

    • Method Detail

      • acceptClient

        boolean acceptClient(NetworkDevice newClient)
        Check whether a new client should be accepted
        Parameters:
        newClient - the new clients identification
        Returns:
        true if the client should be accepted, false otherwise

      • onClientDisconnected

        void onClientDisconnected(NetworkDevice disconnectedClient)
        Called when a client sent a disconnect signal or has disconnected
        Parameters:
        disconnectedClient - the lost client

      • onClientTimeout

        void onClientTimeout(NetworkDevice timeoutClient)
        Called when a client hasn't responded in a while
        Parameters:
        timeoutClient - the client that did not respond

      • onClientAccepted

        void onClientAccepted(NetworkDevice connectedClient)
        Called when a Client has successfully been connected
        Parameters:
        connectedClient - the client that connected successfully
